definition: an inclination to withhold approval from some person or group, have or feel a dislike or distaste for
details:
noun
- an inclination to withhold approval from some person or group
= synonyms: disapproval
- a feeling of aversion or antipathy
= example: a feeling of aversion or antipathy
verb
- have or feel a dislike or distaste for
= example: have or feel a dislike or distaste for
